Message: It appears that Ophelia is late...

From atop this hill,
I have a clear view of
the children playing in the lake.
It might be best if I wait here.

Ophelia is my dearest friend
since childhood, the knight
I can trust my life with...

And, the one who I caused
the most pain.

Executioner and Oathkeeper.
The sword that
vanquishes tyrants,
and the sword that
embodies a knight’s loyalty.

On the day we exchanged
our swords to end
each other’s lives...

The one who forced
that choice upon Ophelia
was none other than me.

And yet, she has always
been there for me.

I wonder...am I doing
everything I can to
live up to her trust?
